song_lyrics: Darashan āpo re, have Dīnbandhu karuṇā karī... °ṭek
Darashan vinā paḷ jug sam jāy chhe,
Dī rāt jāye rotā Hari... Darashan° 2
Darashan dāne karī dukhḍā re ṭāḷo,
Laṭkā upar hu jāu marī... Darashan° 4
title: Darashan āpo re have Dīnbandhu karuṇā karī

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-804: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Leelana Pad
